rangedSpecialActions.name: Bash
rangedSpecialActions.description: Using the firearm to attack your enemy in close combat.

rangedSpecialActions.name: Explosive Punch
rangedSpecialActions.description: Punch an enemy with the gauntlet and fire a grenade just after the punch lands.

rangedSpecialActions.name: Push
rangedSpecialActions.description: Push enemies away with your empty hand.

rangedSpecialActions.name: Special Ammo
rangedSpecialActions.description: Loads the weapon with one special shell that gives next shot horizontal spread pattern and high Stagger.

rangedSpecialActions.name: Strike
rangedSpecialActions.description: Combo attacks using the staff as a melee weapon.

rangedSpecialActions.name: Torch
rangedSpecialActions.description: Turn on or off the weapon mounted torch. Useful in dark areas.

rangedSpecialActions.name: Vent Heat
rangedSpecialActions.description: Quickly decrease either the wielder's Peril or the weapons Overcharge (as appropriate)
